Latest Work

Outcomes For Professionals Age 50+ After Redundancy

August 2025

An interactive Sankey diagram visualizing employment outcomes for professionals aged 50+ following redundancy. This data visualization tracks career transitions over 24 months, revealing patterns in job market re-entry, career changes, and long-term unemployment trends.

Data Visualization D3.js Employment Analysis Interactive Charts

In Development

Exploring how professional skills transfer across industries and the emergence of new career pathways in the modern economy. Interactive exploration of skill adjacency networks.

About

I create data visualizations and analyses that reveal insights into employment, economic trends, and social patterns. My work combines statistical rigor with compelling visual storytelling to make complex data accessible and actionable.

With a focus on employment dynamics, career transitions, and economic indicators, I aim to provide evidence-based perspectives on the challenges and opportunities facing professionals in today's evolving job market.

Learn more about my background and approach →
